tracks.label: Integration
notes: Schema handshake between DTL and DTA mock feeds validated in staging.
Persona ritual definitions under review with mentorship council.

deliverables.title: Strategy Router skeleton service
deliverables.description: Stub service emitting mock DTL/DTA intents to validate schema alignment before production wiring.

deliverables.title: Supabase rationale store
deliverables.description: Normalized store for persona debates, rationale scoring, and audit trails shared with DTA.

deliverables.title: Persona rituals charter
deliverables.description: Documented rituals for research, execution, and risk personas covering gating and review cadence.

tracks.label: Execution
notes: Pending telemetry probes for latency and slippage baselines.
Awaiting router skeleton output before shadow deployments proceed.

deliverables.title: Broker routing bandit
deliverables.description: Exploration/exploitation bandit choosing optimal broker endpoints per strategy lane.

deliverables.title: Latency baseline dashboards
deliverables.description: Grafana dashboards capturing order round-trip, fill latency, and slippage variance.

deliverables.title: Shadow deploy tooling
deliverables.description: Automation for replaying DTL intents through DTA without releasing to production brokers.

tracks.label: Logic
notes: Prototype ensemble evaluation harness scoring strategies against synthetic regimes.
Anomaly detection thresholds drafted; awaiting live telemetry.

deliverables.title: Ensemble evaluation harness
deliverables.description: Batch evaluation harness fusing multiple models to rank DTL hypotheses.

deliverables.title: SMC anomaly detection
deliverables.description: Detector scanning Supabase feeds for Smart Money Concepts deviations and structural drifts.

deliverables.title: Decision delta log
deliverables.description: Append-only log capturing rationale deltas between persona consensus and final execution decision.

tracks.label: Feedback
notes: OpenTelemetry collectors configured for mock pipelines; production credentials pending.
Treasury event sync specification awaiting risk committee approval.

deliverables.title: OpenTelemetry mesh
deliverables.description: Unified telemetry mesh streaming persona metrics, broker telemetry, and mentorship scores.

deliverables.title: Modifier auto-tuning workflow
deliverables.description: Workflow adjusting risk and conviction modifiers from telemetry deltas without human review.

deliverables.title: Treasury event sync
deliverables.description: Event bridge aligning treasury triggers, Oracle signals, and execution throttles.

tracks.label: Learning
notes: Reward function drafts under review; historical fill dataset cleanup underway.
Mentorship scoring rubric waiting on feedback instrumentation.

deliverables.title: RL training loop
deliverables.description: Offline RL training pipeline evaluating strategy intents before deployment.

deliverables.title: Mentorship scoring rubric
deliverables.description: Rubric scoring mentorship and community feedback for backlog prioritization.

deliverables.title: Oracle trigger webhooks
deliverables.description: Webhook suite bridging Intelligence Oracle metrics into treasury and execution notifications.

milestones.title: Router handshake and telemetry baseline
milestones.summary: Mock router publishing events with latency probes captured inside the telemetry mesh.

milestones.title: Persona governance activation
milestones.summary: Persona rituals charter adopted with decision delta logs wired into Supabase.

milestones.title: Learning loop pilot
milestones.summary: RL training loop and mentorship scoring rubric produce actionable backlog updates.
